short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns all things supposed to be links into clickable links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Link turns all 'unclickable' links into normal, clickable ones.

Designed for scratch.mit.edu - but it should work on any site.

By Alex Bates (aka GrannyCookies)
